thread.section_title: Biblio.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Biblio.com | www.biblio.com
thread.title: M. Bader

author: M. Bader
title: M. Bader
text: I did not have the ISBN number for the textbook I was looking for, so I went on the description of the item. It described the Texas textbook, but when I received the item, it was the laboratory activity book. I attempted to return the item, but they said I received the correct book. Therefore, I purchased a book I did not need. The company was not interested in resolving this matter and have lost my business going forward.
